name: Cliche Otome (Demo)
description:
MC is back to school for the spring, attending school with four of Gakko High's most attractive bachelors and bachelorettes. Which one will you choose to take to the Spring Festival this trimester?

Demo includes:

  • A chance to meet the four datable characters
  • Four choices that will affect future routes
  • A 2K word common route

Creators:

Programmer, writer, GUI artist: BabyDev

Writer, artist: nyanbacon
